items.titolo: How AI Companies Got Caught Up in US Military Efforts
items.descrizione: Two years ago, companies like Meta and OpenAI were united against military use of their tools. Now all of that has changed.

items.titolo: Admins finally get the power to uninstall Microsoft Copilot on Windows 11 Pro, Enterprise, and EDU versions — devices must meet specific conditions to allow the removal of the AI app
items.descrizione: Microsoft finally allows administrators to remove the Microsoft Copilot app from managed versions of Windows 11 Pro, Enterprise, and EDU. However, you need to have Microsoft 365 Copilot installed, among other conditions.

items.titolo: Gemini per Siri: dettagli sull’accordo Apple-Google
items.descrizione: Sono trapelati nuovi dettagli sull'accordo tra Apple e Google, insieme alle informazioni sui miglioramenti per Siri ottenuti con l'uso di Gemini. The post Gemini per Siri: dettagli sull’accordo Apple-Google appeared firs

items.titolo: Qwen boss says Chinese AI models have 'less than 20%' chance of leapfrogging Western counterparts — despite China's $1 billion AI IPO week, capital can't close the gap alone
items.descrizione: China’s AI sector made a splash this month as a cluster of domestic AI firms raised more than $1 billion through IPOs in Hong Kong.
